backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a rebuild-trigger file to a fresh-build deployment feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Metadata file summarizing key frontend files and their roles in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for backgrounds, text, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/.rebuild-trigger: Timestamped file used solely to force a fresh build/deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the interactive Valentine experience with phases, animations, and Web Audio effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: App-level styles including fonts, layout containers, animations, and phase-specific visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, plugins, and OKLCH variable-based theming.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current build state, requirements, architecture constraints, and known issues for a self-contained Valentine’s React/TypeScript app. Includes feature definitions, a key bug about the missing 'No' button, and indicates this file represents an active fix request.
